title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: When performing a SaveAs operation on a java file, the file type is not remembered and the icon changes from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file. 
2) Make some modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class). 
3) Click on the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon. 
4) A dialog will appear. 
5) Browse to a valid container location. 
6) Type the filename without including the file extension (which is not requested). 
7) Click Ok. 
Observe that the file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but the file extension is not displayed.
EB: After performing the SaveAs operation, the file should be displayed in the Navigator with the correct file extension and the icon should remain as the parent Java file icon.
